portfolioSectionDescription: Explore our projects and initiatives that reflect our commitment to excellence and innovation.
gallerySectionDescription: Explore our projects and initiatives that reflect our commitment to excellence and innovation.

items.title: Sports Events at Olympic Golf
items.longText: From May 23 to 25, 2025, the VII Olympic Field Open by IFS will bring together over 100 golfers from across Brazil at the Olympic Golf Course, a legacy of the Rio 2016 Games. Over three days of competition (Friday the 23rd, Saturday the 24th, and Sunday the 25th), athletes in Scratch and Handicap categories (up to 8.5; 8.6–14; 14.1–20 for men; and Scratch and up to 16 for women) will play 54 holes under the R&A Rules of St. Andrews and the CBGolfe Code of Conduct, earning points for world, national, and state rankings. Open to the public, the event also features Chef Piero’s Barbecue Festival (24/05, 1 PM–5 PM) and a grand closing concert with Evandro Mesquita & Fabulous Tab (25/05, from 4:30 PM), opening for the band Quarto 17. All set against a backdrop of sporting excellence, gastronomy, and culture in Barra da Tijuca.

items.title: Environmental Lecture Series
items.description: Strengthening the Fertilizer Supply Chain in Rio
items.longText: On September 11, 2024, the Rio de Janeiro Government will host a forum at Casa G20 (Laura Alvim Cultural Center) in Ipanema dedicated to strengthening Brazil’s fertilizer supply chain. Interim Secretary Fernanda Curdi will open the event, featuring a keynote by Upendra Singh (IFDC, USA) and panel discussions with representatives from the Ministries of Agriculture and Mines & Energy, BNDES, Finep, Embrapa, Sinprifert, Anda, Abisolo, Petrobras, Confap, SP Ventures, and Porto do Açu, as well as researchers from UFRJ, UFV, and IAC. The forum aims to discuss technological innovations, biodiversity, and food security in line with the 2050 National Fertilizer Plan and the establishment of the CEFENP Center of Excellence in the state.
details: Location: Casa G20 – Laura Alvim Cultural Center (Ipanema)
Panels with government agencies, Embrapa, BNDES, Finep, Petrobras, and Confap
Researchers from UFRJ, UFV, and IAC

items.title: Sport & Legacy Project
items.longText: On March 15, 2025, the Sport & Legacy Project launched with the founding of the Beach Boxe & Beach Boxing Brasil Ltda. federation. This program offers regular beach boxing training to socially vulnerable youth in coastal communities, promoting discipline, physical and mental health, self-esteem, and community inclusion through sport.
details: Establishment of Beach Boxe & Beach Boxing Brasil Ltda.
Beach boxing sessions for at-risk youth
Development of discipline, confidence, and teamwork

items.title: Clean Bay & Governor’s Island Revitalization
items.description: Lighting, beach cleanups, and urban renewal
items.longText: In just six months, under City Councilor Wagner Tavares’s leadership and in partnership with RioLuz, Governor’s Island received extensive new lighting, enhancing safety and residents’ quality of life. Previously dark streets became bright and secure, while parks, courts, and recreational areas underwent revitalization. For the first time, Ribeira Beach was cleaned of debris in an unprecedented environmental effort, showing respect for both nature and islanders. The administration continues to work on tree trimming, pothole repairs, inspections, and new construction projects—taking care of the island as it deserves.
details: Installation of new lighting on streets and plazas
Revitalization of courts and recreational areas
Tree trimming, pothole repairs, and maintenance
Unprecedented sand cleanup at Ribeira Beach
‘Carioca Islands Gardens’ tourism, cultural, and culinary circuit proposal

items.title: Aqua Bossa Nova & Popular Music Space
items.description: Cultural season in Ipanema dedicated to Bossa Nova and MPB
items.longText: In the cultural sphere, we established a space in Ipanema entirely devoted to Bossa Nova and Brazilian Popular Music. Between October 31, 2014, and February 2016, we produced a series of shows and musical gatherings—such as ‘Women & Beatles’—celebrating sophisticated arrangements and refined harmonies. At the end of the season, we emphasized the importance of leveraging cultural incentive laws to broaden the reach and impact of our projects.
details: Focus on Bossa Nova and MPB

items.title: Pipoca Carioca Concert
items.description: Márcia Castro welcomes Baby do Brasil, Pedro Luís, and Teresa Cristina
items.longText: Singer Márcia Castro brings her ‘Pipoca Carioca’ project to the Aqua stage in a generational celebration of Brazilian music. On January 15, Márcia will be joined by Baby do Brasil, Pedro Luís, and Teresa Cristina for a free night of Brazilian rhythms, blending pop, samba, and MPB in a special repertoire.
details: Special guests: Baby do Brasil, Pedro Luís, Teresa Cristina

items.title: Aqua Space at Rayz Inauguration
items.longText: On the second floor of Rayz restaurant, the Aqua Space in Ipanema was inaugurated with a special lineup of music and gastronomy. Singer Leny Andrade opened the evenings with classic MPB repertoire, followed by performances from Ellen Oléria, the ‘Women & Beatles’ quartet, American saxophonist Eddie Daniels, and Miele.
details: Line-up: Leny Andrade, Ellen Oléria, Women & Beatles, Eddie Daniels, and Miele
Location: Aqua Space (2nd floor of Rayz Restaurant) – corner of Farme de Amoedo and Prudente de Morais, Ipanema
Dates & times: 31/10 and 01/11/2014, doors open at 8:30 PM
Signature cocktails by Bar Chef Elvis Zonzini
Special menu by Chef Daniel Pinho

items.title: Atelier of Aroma
items.description: A sensory workshop for creating natural fragrances, blending olfactory art with a deep connection to nature.
items.longText: At Atelier of Aroma, led by Bruna, participants explore botanical essences to craft their own personalized scents. The experience covers identifying base, heart, and top notes, as well as blending and composition techniques. This project fosters creative immersion, encouraging attentiveness to the aromas around us and strengthening our bond with the environment.
details: Content: scent theory, blending, and fragrance composition
Materials included: natural essence kits and glass bottles

items.title: Flavio Guimarães Feature
items.description: A special conversation with musician and artist Flavio Guimarães, featuring Cristiano Crochemore.
items.longText: In this edition, we welcome Flavio Guimarães for an informal on-stage chat at Rayz Aqua. The artist shares stories about his musical journey and creative process, while special guest Cristiano Crochemore offers insights on sound production and arrangements.

items.title: Os Cariocas Live Performance
items.description: A special concert by the vocal quartet Os Cariocas, performing Brazilian music classics.
items.longText: On February 27 and 28, the iconic quartet Os Cariocas takes the stage at Rayz Aqua to revisit hits that have spanned generations. Renowned for their flawless harmonies and timeless repertoire, they promise an unforgettable evening of Bossa Nova, samba, and MPB.
details: Tickets available online and at the box office

items.title: Soul in Lua Finale
items.description: The closing party featuring Jesuton, DJ Negralha, Cortuah, André Rodrigues, and surprise guests.
items.longText: On February 1, live the final night of Soul in Lua at Espaço Aqua! Experience Jesuton’s captivating performance, energized by DJ Negralha, Cortuah, and André Rodrigues on the decks. Get ready for surprise guest appearances, a vibrant dance floor, and a sonic celebration of the best in Black music.
details: Main lineup: Jesuton, DJ Negralha, Cortuah, André Rodrigues
Location: Rua Prudente de Moraes, 416 – Ipanema
